fullName: Pandamonium Anabaseios: The Twelfth Circle, Part 2

abilities.name: Ultima
abilities.description: High raidwide damage

abilities.name: Palladian Grasp
abilities.description: Tank buster on the half of the arena the tank is standing.

abilities.name: Gaiaochos
abilities.description: High raidwide damage. Destroys all but a small circle of the arena.

abilities.name: Summon Darkness
abilities.description: Summons adds on the outside of the arena.

abilities.name: Ultima Ray
abilities.description: Line aoes from the adds on the outside of the arena.

abilities.name: Missing Link
abilities.description: Chains dps to healers. Can be broken if the chains are pulled apart.

abilities.name: Demi Parhelion + Geocentrism
abilities.description: Aoes on the ground andat the same time as another aoe telegraphed by her tentacles.

abilities.name: Divine Excoriation
abilities.description: Small aoes on each party member.

abilities.name: The Classical Concepts
abilities.description: High raid damage. Tethers players together with playstation markers and summons shapes that will tether.

abilities.name: Aspect Effect
abilities.description: Moderate raid damage from the shape tethers that players intercept.

abilities.name: Implode
abilities.description: Explosion from each shape.

abilities.name: Palladian Ray
abilities.description: Persistent cone aoe from the spear to the nearest 4 players.

abilities.name: Crush Helm
abilities.description: 5-hit tankbuster that applies a stacking vuln on the first 4 hits. Vuln must be cleaned via Esuna.

abilities.name: Crush Helm (Final Hit)
abilities.description: Final hit of tankbuster. Deadly if vuln is not cleansed. Still does significant damage with cleanse.

abilities.name: Caloric Theory
abilities.description: Raidwide damage and debuffs players with fire and wind debuffs.

abilities.name: Pyre Pulse
abilities.description: Fire debuffs explode. Must be stacked by at least 2 people total.

abilities.name: Dynamic Atmosphere + Pyre Pulse
abilities.description: Wind and fire debuffs explode. Fires must be stacked by at least 2 people total. Winds cannot be stacked.

abilities.name: Ekpyrosis (Cast)
abilities.description: Cast for exaflare mechanic.

abilities.name: Ekpyrosis (Exaflares begin)
abilities.description: Exaflares begin cascading through the arena.

abilities.name: Ekpyrosis (proximity damage)
abilities.description: Proximity markers go off during exaflares, dealing high raidwide damage.

abilities.name: Ekpyrosis (spreads)
abilities.description: Spread aoes go off on each player, dealing high raidwide damage.

abilities.name: Pangenesis
abilities.description: High raidewide damage, leaving players with DNA debuffs and dark/light tilts.

abilities.name: Pantheos
abilities.description: Spawns 3 sets of towers that must be soaked by the appropriate players.

abilities.name: Polarized Advent
abilities.description: Towers resolve, dealing light damage.

abilities.name: Factor In
abilities.description: Large defamation aoes on tethered players.

abilities.name: Panta Rhei
abilities.description: Flips classical concept shapes across horizontal and vertical axes.

abilities.name: Entropic Excess
abilities.description: Rot that must be passed in a chain. Occassionally drops aoe under current player that can be dodged.

abilities.name: Dynamic Atmosphere
abilities.description: Wind aoes resolve. Players must be spread apart

abilities.name: Ultima Blow
abilities.description: Line aoe on 4 tethered players. Must be soaked by another player.

abilities.name: Ignorabimus
abilities.description: Enrage.
